Review_title: a great documentary that captures the magic of a great talent
Review_Text:
Meryl Streep's artistic diversity is astounding. Whether thriller, psychological drama, comedy or musical - the star who never wanted to be one captivates with an incredible range. She is one of the most versatile and successful actresses of all time and is still considered a superstar at the age of 70. She gives her characters a very special charisma and fascinates audiences and filmmakers alike. What is the secret recipe of this rather reserved and intellectual woman who doesn't fit the Hollywood star stereotype at all?A great documentary about a great actress that provides interesting insights and portrays her professional career. It shows how multi-faceted Meryl Streep is, how she chooses her roles with a keen sense for the characters she portrays and how she was able to convince directors to give her characters their personal touch. Although most of the film is translated into German, there are several interview excerpts which are in the original English. So a basic knowledge of English is an advantage.-------------
Conclusion:Excellent - A very nice documentary that brings you closer to this humble and fascinating personality and captures the magic of her talent.
